ISSUE.TITLE: rm -fa + dependencies is still issuing warnings
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: I assume it's a flake, since otherwise Matt's PR would never have merged. ``` [It] podman rm -fa with dependencies ... # podman [options] rm -fa kill container: No such process a56742cb3f318e7bebcf568d2fb67c72e2753528be9df535211c451b3a4a4230 5210226ca965cd1b101ea5c4d417957e84463b53f47d4f228545a5d999ffcb39 [FAILED] rm -fa error logged ``` In [rawhide root](https://api.cirrus-ci.com/v1/artifact/task/5234205953622016/html/int-podman-rawhide-root-host-sqlite.log.html#t--Podman-rm-podman-rm--fa-with-dependencies--1)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Merge pull request #18964 from cevich/renovate_golang_ci_lint [CI:BUILD] Help Renovate manage the golangci-lint version

COMMIT.MESSAGE: StopContainer(): ignore one more conmon warning Resolves: #18865 [NO NEW TESTS NEEDED] -- it's a flake Signed-off-by: Ed Santiago <santiago@redhat.com>
